doc:
Monty Woolley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monty_Woolley 0 Edgar Montilion "Monty" Woolley (August 17, 1888 – May 6, 1963) was an American stage, film, radio, and television actor. At the age of 50, he achieved a measure of stardom for his best-known role in the stage play and 1942 film The Man Who Came to Dinner. His distinctive white beard was his trademark and he was affectionately known as "The Beard."
